channel.description: Most recent posts published on the Symfony project blog

item.title: Save the date, SymfonyDay Montreal 2026!
item.description:
We're thrilled to announce that SymfonyDay Montreal is happening on June 4, 2026! ğŸ‰
Mark your calendars, tell your friends, and get ready for a day full of inspiring talks, networking opportunities, and the vibrant energy of the Symfony communityâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
We're thrilled to announce that SymfonyDay Montreal is happening on June 4, 2026! ğŸ‰

Mark your calendars, tell your friends, and get ready for a day full of inspiring talks, networking opportunities, and the vibrant energy of the Symfony community in Canada! ğŸ

ğŸŸï¸ Register now to secure your seat, here!

ğŸ“Call for papers is open!

Submit your talk for SymfonyDay Montreal 2026! Every selected speaker will receive a complimentary conference ticket and a speaker gift! Speakers who do not live in the conference city will also have their travel and accommodation expenses covered.

If you have never spoken at a conference before, you can take advantage of our speaker mentoring program! Experienced speakers will gladly assist you in preparing for your conference, whether it involves creating your slides or rehearsing your talk. Feel free to seek advice in the #diversity or #speaker-mentoring channels on the Symfony Devs Slack or include comments requesting guidance when submitting your talk proposal.

ğŸ¤ Want to support the event?

Become a sponsor and showcase your brand to an engaged audience of developers.

âš¡Contact Hadrien Cren by email to learn more about the options.

We can't wait to see you there!

Sponsor the Symfony project.
item.dc:creator: Paola SuÃ¡rez

item.title: SymfonyCon Amsterdam 2025: Call for IT student volunteers: Volunteer, Learn & Connect!
item.description:
ğŸ“SymfonyCon Amsterdam 2025: Call for IT Student Volunteers!
Are you an IT or computer science student looking to gain hands-on experience, grow your network, and take part in an international tech event? ğŸ¤âœ¨ Symfony is looking for motivated studentâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
ğŸ“SymfonyCon Amsterdam 2025: Call for IT Student Volunteers!

Are you an IT or computer science student looking to gain hands-on experience, grow your network, and take part in an international tech event? ğŸ¤âœ¨ Symfony is looking for motivated student volunteers to join the adventure at SymfonyCon Amsterdam 2025!

ğŸ“Where: Amsterdam, The Netherlands

ğŸ—“ï¸When: November 28â€“29, 2025

Volunteering with us means helping out for one day and getting a free ticket to attend the conference the other day, so you don't miss out on the action!

ğŸ’¼ Volunteer Tasks

As a volunteer, you'll be assigned to:

âœ”ï¸Welcome attendees

âœ”ï¸Provide directions and information

âœ”ï¸Help ensure everything runs smoothly!

âœ… Requirements

To apply, you must:

âœ”ï¸Be a student in computer science / IT (all backgrounds welcome!)

âœ”ï¸Be curious about careers in development or tech

âœ”ï¸Be available for at least one full day during the event

âœ”ï¸Speak English (conference language)

ğŸ What You Get

Free access to the full 2-day SymfonyCon Amsterdam 2025 conference

âœ”ï¸Opportunities to network with developers, speakers, and community leaders

âœ”ï¸Delicious lunches included

âœ”ï¸An unforgettable experience in an inclusive and friendly environment!

ğŸš« Please note:

We are unable to cover:

âœ”ï¸Travel or accommodation costs âœ”ï¸Dinners or evening expenses

ğŸ’Œ How to Apply:

Interested? Send us an email at events@symfony.com with:

âœ”ï¸Your name, school, and area of study

âœ”ï¸The reason you'd like to volunteer

âœ”ï¸Confirmation of your availability on November 28 or 29, 2025

Be part of the Symfony community, gain valuable experience, and help make this event amazing! We can't wait to meet you! ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»ğŸ’¬ #SymfonyCon

Sponsor the Symfony project.
